Article.ArticleTitle: Harnessing the Benefits of Telehealth in Long COVID Service Provision.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Clinic Nineteen Long COVID Clinic, Melbourne, VIC, Australia.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: The authors work at a telehealth-based clinic in Australia dedicated to provision of care to long COVID patients. This work was submitted separately to usual care and no payment or other services were received to undertake writing this letter.
